## Baseline Visit Identifiers

**Participant study ID:** __________________________

**Date of baseline visit (dd/mm/yyyy):** ____ / ____ / ______

**Staff initials:** __________________________



## Before the Baseline Visit

  $\square$ Screening eligibility confirmed

  $\square$ Participant expressed interest in taking part

  $\square$ Participant Information Sheet available

  $\square$ Consent form available

  $\square$ REDCap baseline event opened

## Welcome and Orientation

  $\square$ Voluntary nature of participation reconfirmed

  $\square$ Visit procedures explained

  $\square$ Opportunity for questions provided


## Eligibility Reconfirmation

  $\square$ Type 2 diabetes diagnosis reconfirmed
  
  $\square$ Insulin status confirmed
  
  $\square$ No material changes since screening
  
  $\square$ Borderline eligibility identified and escalated (if applicable)

## Informed Consent

  $\square$ Participant Information Sheet reviewed with participant
  
  $\square$ Data use and confidentiality explained
  
  $\square$ Withdrawal rights explained

  $\square$ Written informed consent obtained *before data collection*

  $\square$ Consent date recorded in REDCap

## Participant Administration

  $\square$ Participant study ID assigned / confirmed
  
  $\square$ Group allocation recorded (intervention / control)
  
## Baseline Measurements Collected

### Anthropometry and Clinical Measures

  $\square$ Height (baseline only)
  
  $\square$ Weight
  
  $\square$ Waist circumference
  
  $\square$ Hip circumference
  
  $\square$ Blood pressure
  
  $\square$ Capillary blood glucose

### Laboratory Measures

  $\square$ HbA1c
  
  $\square$ Liver function tests
  
  $\square$ FibroScan completed or scheduled (if applicable)

### Medication Status

  $\square$ Diabetes medication status recorded
  
  $\square$ Hypertension medication status recorded

### Patient-Reported Outcome Measures

  $\square$ EQ-5D-3L completed
  
  $\square$ PAID questionnaire completed
  
  $\square$ IPAQ short form completed

## Data Quality Checks

  $\square$ Required baseline fields completed
  
  $\square$ Implausible or missing values addressed

## Next Steps Confirmed

  $\square$ Intervention participant: next visit and TMR start explained
  
  $\square$ Control participant: follow-up schedule explained

## After the Visit

  $\square$ All baseline data entered into REDCap
  
  $\square$ Consent form stored securely
  
  $\square$ Any safety issues escalated
